title: Can't start league of legends
body: I just got the latest patch and began patching but it stopped before full patching so i eventually closed it. I then opened league again but now there is a problem with the patcher kernel. Also my other LOL file just keeps bugsplatting.

replies.body: Typically that patcher kernel error is caused when the client isn't able to read from certain files, mostly due to administrator issues. Make sure that you've got all of the [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) settings you need for League to be able to access those files!
